content: अंकः [अंक् कर्तरि करणे वा अच्] {@--1@} The lap ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also); अंकाद्ययावंकमुदीरिताशीः <ls>Ku. 7. 5</ls> passed from lap to lap. {@--2@} A mark, sign; अलक्तकांकां पदवीं ततान <ls>R. 7. 9</ls>; पदपंक्तिरलक्तांका <ls>Rām.</ls>; रतिवलयपदांके कंठे <ls>Ku. 2. 64</ls> marked with the signs or traces &c.; मद्गोत्रांकं गेयं <ls>Me. 86</ls>; a stain, spot, stigma, brand; इंदोः किरणेष्विवांकः <ls>Ku. 1. 3</ls>; कट्यां कृतांको निर्वास्यः <ls>Ms. 8. 281.</ls> {@--3@} A numerical figure; a number; the number {9} {@--4@} A side, flank; proximity, reach (connected with 1 above); समुत्सुकेवांकमुपैति सिद्धिः <ls>Ki. 3. 40</ls>; प्रेम्णोपकंठं मुहुरंकभाजो रत्नावलीरंबुधिराबबंध <ls>Śi. 3. 36</ls>; सिंहो जंबुकमंकमागतमपि त्यत्त्वा निहंति द्विपं <ls>Bh. 2. 30</ls>; <ls>Ki. 17. 64</ls>, See °आगत below. {@--5@} An act of a drama, for its nature &c, See <ls>S. D. 278.</ls> {@--6@} A hook or curved instrument. {@--7@} A species of dramatic composition, one of the ten varieties of रूपक, See <ls>S. D. 519.</ls> {@--8@} An ornament (भूषा). {@--9@} A sham fight, military show (चित्रयुद्ध). {@--10@} A coefficient. {@--11@} A place. {@--12@} A sin, misdeed. {@--13@} A line, curved line; a curve or bend generally, the bend in the arm. {@--14@} The body. {@--15@} A mountain. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%uncus%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%ogkos%}].
